description.en:
1. Hanayome Sengen
Toudou Manufacturer's Director, Toudo Kaoru, is doing his best to avoid an arranged marriage and ends up stringing part-time cleaner, Kagami Eiji, along in his spontaneous plan. Will their deception work or will both men end up being swept along by their own ruse?

4. Hot Closet
Kanda Takashi immediately falls for his beautiful superior, Tokishima Azusa, the moment he laid eyes on him. Although he is undeniably infatuated, Kanda refuses to hope that his impossible crush will be reciprocated. Intending to drown his sorrows, Kanda organizes a night out with a friend and somehow stumbles upon an incredible secret being kept by Tokishima.
